privacy.title: Privacy Policy

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: LexiconX ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our language learning application.
intro.contact: For any questions about this policy, please contact our Data Protection Officer at gabrielcmoris@gmail.com

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.google: Google Account information when you sign in (email, name, profile picture)
dataCollection.language: Language learning preferences and native language
dataCollection.usage: Usage statistics and interaction with the application

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.progress: To track and display your learning progress
dataUsage.improvement: To improve our services and features

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.mongodb: MongoDB Atlas for secure data storage
thirdParty.gemini: Google Gemini AI for quiz generation

userRights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
userRights.access: Right to access your personal data
userRights.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data
userRights.portability: Right to receive your data in a portable format
userRights.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent at any time
userRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at gabrielcmoris@gmail.com

security.title: Data Security
security.measures: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
security.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.period: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
retention.deletion: You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.policy: Our service is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.notification: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.info: For any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: gabrielcmoris@gmail.com

privacy.effectiveDate: This Privacy Policy is effective as of July 22, 2025

section1.title: Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to LexiconX. By using our service, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

section2.title: Service Description
section2.content: LexiconX is a language learning platform that provides:

features.quiz: AI-generated quizzes tailored to your learning level
features.languages: Support for multiple languages including English, German, Chinese, and Spanish

section3.title: User Obligations
section3.content: Users must provide accurate information, maintain account security, and use the service responsibly.

section4.title: Data Protection
section4.content: We collect and process the following data in accordance with GDPR:

data.usage: Service usage patterns to improve user experience

section5.title: Cancellation and Termination
section5.content: You may delete your account at any time. This will permanently remove all your data from our systems.

section6.title: Legal Information
section6.content: This service is provided by LexiconX, based in Germany. These terms are governed by German law.
